StevO's Delivery
Stevo`s Pizza delivers your pizza and ribs hot to your door....but did you know that StevO's also delivers from any restaurant?
Information for other restaurant delivery
We charge $7.50 for other restaurant delivery. If you are ordering from a fast food restaurant, please place your order with us. If you are ordering from a sit down restaurant, please order from them (don't for pay for it, and make sure to ask for the total). Please make sure your restaurant and you, are in our delivery area. Call us for questions. We ask that you please use credit card to pay for this service. The $7.50 charge does not go to your driver. Please remember that they have driven to your restaurant, waited for your order, then driven to you. They appreciate tips and depend on them for most of their pay.
